title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 70.3 - Order for payment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 70.3 - Order for payment

State Regulations

No payment, investment, surrender or delivery of court
funds, property or security may be made by any county treasurer or depository, without a certified copy of an order or decree of the court having jurisdiction
of such funds, property and securities, directing each such payment, investment, surrender or delivery. However, payment may be made by a county
treasurer without a court order, to the person entitled thereto or his
authorized attorney, whenever the amount paid into court, inclusive of interest
earned thereon, does not exceed $50. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
70.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
